entry.title: Useful bitcoin patches...
entry.summary: A user named Jeff has been accused of neglecting to attribute the original author for a rewritten part of bugfix_CreateThread_leak. The accusation is made in response to a message from Jeff regarding several git branches, including hub_mode, threaded_rpc, signal_blk_notify, and more. In addition to these branches, Jeff considers coinbaser, gitignore, minfee_modes, eligius_relay, eligius_sendfee, txinfo, and bitcoinuri as valid candidates for merging. All of the above-mentioned git branches are available from git://gitorious.org/~Luke-Jr/bitcoin/luke-jr-bitcoin.git.
